Creatives

Meet our creative professionals who bring artistic vision and technical expertise to every project.

üìçBerlin
Graffiti Illustration Tattoo Visual arts

Eve Queiroz is a Brazilian visual artist who has stood out for her creative trajectory, which moves between street art, illustration, tattoo and cannabis consultancy. She began her artistic career in 2009 with the Negahamburguer project, focused on graffiti, and over the years has expanded her work to other forms of expression, addressing social issues such as freedom of the body, blackness and women's rights. Her work reflects a strong connection with her identity and the search for freedom and social justice. Her most recent work integrates cannabis culture, and Eve also works as a consultant.

Hadryah

üìçBerlin

A self-taught and multidisciplinary artist, they move fluidly between music, visual arts, upcycling, clothing customization, and performance. Their creations don‚Äôt follow formulas ‚Äî they emerge from a genuine impulse for expression, healing, and transformation. Each piece, each sound, each gesture carries the energy of someone who lives art as both therapy and a tool for expanding consciousness. Their brilliance shines through in the way they see possibilities where others see waste: garments are given new life in their hands, transformed with intention and care. Customization and material reuse are not just aesthetic choices, but a philosophy ‚Äî a practice that blends sustainability, identity, and creative resistance. Whether on stage or in the studio, their presence is powerful, intuitive, and constantly evolving. With innovative ideas and a deep inner listening, they use art as a mirror and a portal ‚Äî a path inward, outward, and toward the collective. Their journey is one of healing, and their language is art.

Mamede

üìçBerlin

Originally from Maranh√£o, Brazil, Mamede is a Berlin-based DJ whose sound bridges the vibrant pulse of the Brazilian Northeast with global dance floors. With past lives in Bel√©m and S√£o Paulo, and performances in cities like Tokyo, Amsterdam, Madrid, and Barcelona, Mamede brings a uniquely diasporic perspective to his sets. ‚Äã Blending tribal, house, and disco, his music celebrates queer joy and cultural resilience. Mamede curates a monthly party in Berlin while continuously exploring new artistic and sonic territories.

About Us

At UNIDES, we bring culture to life through unforgettable events where music, art, and community meet. Talent. Culture. Impact.

Our Mission

Elevate the next generation of Latinx visionaries‚Äîfrom underground musicians to boundary-pushing visual artists. Connect authentic creativity with brands and audiences hungry for something real. Redefining what ‚ÄûLatin art‚Äú means in Europe‚Äîbreaking stereotypes with unstoppable innovation.

Our Vision

Uniting Latinx talent and culture to transform the creative landscape‚Äîboldly, purposefully, together.

Our Values

Rooted in Culture

We honor our Latin American heritage and celebrate the diversity that makes us powerful.

Together We Rise

Growth means nothing if we don't rise together. We build careers through real collaboration and community.

Support & Elevation

We understand how hard this path can be. That's why we're not just agents‚Äîwe're allies.

Trust & Respect

Every relationship we build is grounded in mutual respect, transparency, and long-term trust. From day one, our goal has been clear: to unite incredible talent with the right platforms, people, and opportunities, while staying true to who we are.

Meet the Founder

Grasi

Founder

With over 7 years of experience in operations and logistics, I bring structure, strategy, and creative problem-solving to the heart of talent management. I'm passionate about building systems that work efficiently, intuitively, and with room to grow. My background in streamlining complex processes is complemented by a lifelong love of art, which inspires fresh, human-centered solutions. At our agency, I focus on making things run smoothly behind the scenes so talent and creativity can take center stage. I'm excited to shape a space where artists thrive and ideas move with intention.

Ready to Build Something Real?

Whether you're a visionary artist ready to rise or a brand searching for authentic, culture-shaping talent‚Äîwe're here to make powerful, purposeful connections. Let's create something unforgettable, together.
